name: Jeffwang
body:
### I'm Hanbin Wang
##Table of Contents
[The Power of Algorithms](#power)
<a name = "power"\>
### The Power of Algorithms  
  **Algorithms came to rule our world**  
Why I want to post something about algorithms here?    
> * Write some blogs about computer science
> * Output is very important
> * Share my ideas with others

**_Genius is nothing more nor less than childhood recaptured at will.  
 Although I am not a genius, I have the eager desire to learn._**

### Some topics:
* [Single Source Shortest Path](http://blog.csdn.net/whb923/article/details/42522331)
* [Dijkstra's Shortest-Path Algorithm Implementation](http://blog.csdn.net/whb923/article/details/42915213)

###Markdown **_is not_** that hard!

####Introduction

I found an _online tutorial_,     
I will complete these lessons to learn how to use **Markdown**.

By the way, I like cats!! ![picture](http://f.hiphotos.baidu.com/baike/c0%3Dbaike116%2C5%2C5%2C116%2C38/sign=5825186eac51f3ded7bfb136f5879b7a/6d81800a19d8bc3e7406d66e818ba61ea8d3450c.jpg)

####Some basic syntaxes

>* **Bold** (" ** ** ** ** ")
>*  _Italic_ ("_ _" )
>* Header (####)
>* Link  inline link (_[ ] ( )_)& reference link([ ] [ ]; [ ]:link )
> * Insert a Picture (Use exclamation point **"!"**) 
> * Block Quote(Use "greater than" >)
> * Lists 
>  * Ordered (1. 2. 3. )
>  * Unordered( " * " )
>  * Nest
> * Formatting paragraphs
>   1. Soft Break: inserting two spaces _after_ each new line 
>   2. Hard Break:  insert a new line forcefully, press _"Enter"_

#### Online Resources

* [**Wikipedia about Markdown Syntax**](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown#Syntax_examples)
* [**StackEdit-- In-browser Markdown Editor**](https://stackedit.io/editor)
* [**Marxico--Markdown Editor for Evernote**](http://marxi.co/#introducing-markdown)
* [**Writing on Github**](https://help.github.com/articles/writing-on-github/)
* [**Markdown Cheatsheet**](https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet#links)
